name: Debug.Logger
description:
Warning! This game contains bugs.

Debug.Logger is a Sokoban puzzle game...
with local 2-payer collaboration...
featuring 105 hand-crafted levels...
and a variety of intricate mechanics...

Bugs were inevitable. You are required to log them. Beware the bugs features.

There are 9 differing bug types, each with a unique glitch that makes the logging process more... interesting.

Are you ready to log them all?

Credits

This game was designed  by Error404: Studio_not_found 

  • Joshua Jandrell - Programming and System Design
  • Matipa Marufu - Narrative and Level Design
  • Molebogeng Mashile - Art
